name: Escape From The Lost Planet (Easy)
description:
ESPAÑOL:

Eres el astronauta Sainferden, tu nave se ha averiado y has tenido que aterrizar en un planeta desconocido. Tu misión es llegar a un complejo para poder recuperar piezas para arreglar tu nave.

ENGLISH:

You are the astronaut Sainferden, your ship has broken down and you have had to land on an unknown planet. Your mission is to reach a complex to recover parts to fix your ship.

Controles / Controls

Joystick o Teclado:

←: Izquierda →:  Derecha C/↑: Salto

Joystick or Keyboard:

←: Left →: Right  C/↑:Jump 

A Pocket Platform Game By: Isaías Díaz Toledano Music / Sound FX: Jimmy Devesa

Normal Version.
